overview: Mad Scientist Dr. Werner von Sperm has created The Orgy Machine!  It can see through walls, and it can control people's minds!  Anyone brought under its influence turns from their normal pursuits to wild, crazed, sex!  How much will countries pay him to avoid having their top people turned into sex-crazed libertines?  He wants to find out!
tagline: ALONE?... You can never be too sure!
title: The Orgy Machine
